problem_names:
lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>B :== b,
            \<acute>C :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>B = y \<and> \<acute>C = c\<rbrace>"

lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>G :== b + \<acute>B,
            \<acute>H :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>"

lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>G :== b + \<acute>B,
            \<acute>H :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>"
translations:
lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>B :== b,
            \<acute>C :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>B = y \<and> \<acute>C = c\<rbrace>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma>
       \<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
                    (False, \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace>)
                    \<longmapsto> BASIC
                                  LET (a, b, c) = foo \<acute>A
                                  IN \<acute>A :== a, \<acute>B :== b,
                                     \<acute>C :== c
                                  END
                    \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and>
                             \<acute>B = y \<and> \<acute>C = c\<rbrace>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>A.
       A = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
       A < 0 \<and>
       fst (foo A) = x \<and>
       fst (snd (foo A)) = y \<and> snd (snd (foo A)) = c

lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>G :== b + \<acute>B,
            \<acute>H :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma>
       \<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
                    (False, \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace>)
                    \<longmapsto> BASIC
                                  LET (a, b, c) = foo \<acute>A
                                  IN \<acute>H :== c
                                  END
                    \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and>
                             \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>A B.
       A = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
       A < 0 \<and>
       fst (foo A) = x \<and>
       fst (snd (foo A)) + B = y \<and> snd (snd (foo A)) = c

definition foo:: "nat \<Rightarrow> (nat \<times> nat \<times> nat)"
  where "foo n = (n,n+1,n+2)"

lemma "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace> \<longmapsto> BASIC
       LET (a,b,c) = foo \<acute>A
       IN
            \<acute>A :== a,
            \<acute>G :== b + \<acute>B,
            \<acute>H :== c
      END
      \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and> \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma>
       \<turnstile> \<lbrace>\<acute>A = 0\<rbrace>
                    (False, \<lbrace>\<acute>A < 0\<rbrace>)
                    \<longmapsto> BASIC
                                  LET (a, b, c) = foo \<acute>A
                                  IN \<acute>H :== c
                                  END
                    \<lbrace>\<acute>A = x \<and>
                             \<acute>G = y \<and> \<acute>H = c\<rbrace>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>A B.
       A = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
       A < 0 \<and> A = x \<and> A + 1 + B = y \<and> A + 2 = c
